consent.title: This site uses cookies
consent.description: We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners, who may combine it with other information you have provided to them or that they have collected from your use of their services.

details.title: Cookie details
details.description0: Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make the user experience more efficient.
details.description1: The law states that we may store cookies on your device if they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we need your consent.
details.description2: This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages.
details.description3: You can change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie Declaration on our website at any time.

about.title: About us
about.description: Find out more about who we are, how you can contact us and how we process personal data in our Privacy Policy.

googleAnalytics.name: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.description: Google Analytics collects information about how visitors use our website. We use this information to create reports that help us improve the site. Google Analytics may collect information such as IP address, browser type, pages visited and time spent on the site.

googleAdWords.name: Google Ads
googleAdWords.description: Google Ads allows us to track conversions and optimise ads. We use this tool to measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns and deliver more relevant ads to users.

hotjar.name: Hotjar
hotjar.description: Hotjar helps us understand how users interact with our website through session recordings, heatmaps and surveys. These tools help us improve the user experience on our site.

vercelAnalytics.name: Vercel Analytics
vercelAnalytics.description: Vercel Analytics helps us analyse the performance and usage of our website. It collects anonymous data about visits that help us optimise the site.

vercelSpeedInsights.name: Vercel Speed Insights
vercelSpeedInsights.description: Vercel Speed Insights measures our website performance in real time. It helps us identify loading speed issues and optimise the user experience.

facebookAds.name: Facebook Ads
facebookAds.description: Facebook Ads allows us to track conversions from advertising campaigns on Facebook and Instagram. It helps us measure the effectiveness of our ads and deliver more relevant content to users.

my.title: My things
my.desc: Your jobs, applications and favorite jobs.
my.noFavorites: You don't have any saved jobs yet. Click the star next to a job to add it to favorites.

auth.name: Name
auth.enterEmailPassword: Enter your email and password to sign in.
auth.enterDetails: Enter your details to register. You will be logged in after registration.
auth.promoDescription: Create an account to quickly find jobs perfectly matched to you.
auth.promoCtaLogin: I already have an account â€“ log in
auth.promoBarText: Do you have or want to create an Hoplo account?
auth.mustAcceptTerms: You must accept the terms and privacy policy.
auth.termsLabel: I accept the terms of service
auth.redirectingToLogin: You will be redirected to the login page shortly.
auth.profileFetchTimeout: Loading profile is taking too long. Check if the backend is running (e.g. on port 3001).
auth.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter the email address associated with your account. We will send you a link to set a new password.
auth.forgotPasswordSuccess: If an account exists with this email, you will receive a link to set a new password.
auth.resetPasswordDesc: Enter your new password and confirm it. The link from the email is valid for 1 hour.
auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Your password has been reset. You can now log in.
auth.noResetToken: No reset link. Use the link from the email or request a new one.

profile.editProfileDesc: Change your name, surname, email address or password. After changing password you will be logged out.
profile.passwordMinLength: Min. 6 characters. After changing password you will be logged out.
profile.runOnboardingDesc: Complete your account setup in the onboarding wizard.
profile.cropCoverDesc: Drag and zoom to select the area.
profile.coverUploadFailed: Failed to upload or remove cover photo.
profile.businessProfileDesc: A contractor profile is your public profile (company or individual). You can create a profile or edit an existing one.
profile.contractorProfileDesc: A contractor profile is your public profile (company or individual). You can create a profile or edit an existing one.
profile.contractorProfileNone: You don't have a contractor profile yet.
profile.phoneDesc: We use it only for important information about application status.
profile.companyIdPlaceholder: Linked company ID (e.g. from company list)
profile.tabCompanyDesc: Company data from GUS registry. Enter NIP to link a company to your account, or refresh data from the registry.
profile.companyNoNip: You don't have a linked company yet. Enter NIP (10 digits) â€“ the system will look it up in GUS and link the company to your account.
profile.companyNipHint: NIP must be 10 digits. Data will be fetched from GUS registry.
profile.companyLinked: Company has been linked to your account.
profile.companyRefreshCardDesc: Fetch current company data from GUS registry.
profile.companyRefreshHint: Changed data? Fetch it again from the registry
profile.companyRefreshed: Company data has been updated from GUS registry.
profile.companyChangeHint: Enter a different NIP to link another company to your account. Data will be fetched from GUS registry.
profile.companyUnlinkConfirm: Are you sure you want to detach the company from your profile? You can link a company again by NIP later.
profile.companyUnlinked: Company has been detached from your profile.
profile.noPasswordGoogle: You don't have a password because you signed in with Google. You can set a password by entering it twice â€“ then you can log in with both Google and your password.
profile.passwordBothRequired: Enter the new password in both fields.
profile.defaultMessageDesc: Welcome message with portfolio links. You can personalize it during each submission.
profile.defaultMessagePlaceholder:
Hello! I'm interested in this job. Here are links to my portfolio:

- Portfolio: https://example.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/username

I'm happy to answer any questions!

create.slugHint: Only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens. URL: /company/[slug]
create.createPageDescription: A visiting card is your public profile (company or individual). After verification it will be visible in the service.
create.createPageAdvantage2: One page with contact details and offer description
create.createPageAdvantage4: Your profile will show a "Request a quote" button â€“ you'll be recommended to people looking for your skills
create.createPageAdvantage5: You can add a link to your website (SEO)
create.createPageCoverPlaceholderHint: You can add a cover photo after creating your visiting card

validation.nameMax: Name must be at most 200 characters
validation.surnameMax: Surname must be at most 200 characters
validation.phoneMax: Phone must be at most 30 characters
validation.messageMax: Message must be at most 2000 characters
validation.profileNameMin: Profile name must be at least 2 characters
validation.profileNameMax: Profile name must be at most 200 characters
validation.slugMin: Slug must be at least 2 characters
validation.slugMax: Slug must be at most 100 characters
validation.slugInvalid: Slug: only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens (e.g. my-company)
validation.slugTaken: This visiting card URL is already taken. Choose another one.
validation.aboutUsMax: About us must be at most 2000 characters
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

onboarding.phoneDesc: We will use it only to send important information about application status (e.g. application accepted, status updates).
onboarding.phoneSettingsNote: You can change notification options later in settings.
onboarding.enterNameSurname: Your data will not be publicly visible. Under your application only your first name and the first letter of your surname will be visible. Your data will be seen by the person you choose as the contractor for your job.
onboarding.chooseAccountTypeDesc: Choose whether you are a client looking for a freelancer or a freelancer looking for work.
onboarding.clientDesc: I'm looking for a freelancer and want to publish jobs
onboarding.freelancerDesc: I'm looking for clients and want to apply to jobs
onboarding.companyDesc: Optional â€“ enter your company tax ID (NIP) if you invoice through a business.
onboarding.companyFetchError: Company not found in GUS. Check the NIP.
onboarding.companyChooseOption: Please choose whether you have a company.
onboarding.companySizeQuestion: Do you work solo or represent a larger company?
onboarding.companySizeRequired: Please choose whether you work solo or represent a larger company.
onboarding.freelancerSkillsDesc: Select the skills you have so we can better match you with jobs.
onboarding.freelancerDefaultMessageDesc: Create a welcome message with portfolio links. You can personalize it during each submission.
onboarding.freelancerDefaultMessagePlaceholder:
Hello! I'm interested in this job. Here are links to my portfolio:

- Portfolio: https://example.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/username

I'm happy to answer any questions!
onboarding.freelancerDefaultMessageHint: You can change this message later in profile settings.
onboarding.freelancerCategoriesDesc: Select categories that interest you. You will receive a daily newsletter with new jobs from these categories. You can change this anytime on each category page.
onboarding.profileQuestionTitle: Do you want to create a visiting card?
onboarding.profileQuestionDescription: A visiting card is your public profile (company or individual). You can create it now or skip and come back later.
onboarding.profileQuestionYes: Yes, I want to create a visiting card

agreements.title: Accept Terms and Privacy Policy
agreements.description: To use the service you must accept the current terms of service and privacy policy. Without this acceptance you cannot use the service.
agreements.termsLabel: I accept the terms of service
agreements.acceptFailed: Failed to save acceptance. Refresh the page and try again.

company.rejectedEditHint: After making corrections, the visiting card will be reviewed again.
company.profileNotFoundDesc: This profile does not exist or is not yet verified.

company.editDescription: Update profile details. After verification it will be visible at /company/profile-slug.

jobs.headerSampleWithoutCategory: Check out a sample of the {count} jobs posted on Hoplo
jobs.editJobDescription: After saving, the job will return to "Draft" status and will require re-approval by an administrator.
jobs.categoryNewsletterDescription: Receive a daily newsletter with new jobs from this category.
jobs.noFavorites: You don't have any saved jobs yet. Click the star next to a job to add it to favorites.
jobs.waitingForAdmin: Waiting for administrator approval. Visible only to author.
jobs.rejectJobDescription: Provide a reason for rejection. The user will receive an email with the information and a request to fix the job.
jobs.rejectReasonPlaceholder: Describe what needs to be fixed in the jobâ€¦
jobs.rejectedEditHint: Make corrections and save â€“ the job will go back to administrator review.
jobs.title: Title
jobs.fillRequired: Fill in title, description and category
jobs.selectHoursPerWeek: For hourly billing, select hours per week
jobs.invalidOfferDays: Days to collect offers: choose 7, 14, 21 or 30 days
jobs.deadlinePassedMessage: Application deadline has passed. You can no longer apply.
jobs.applyCriteriaNotMet: You do not meet the criteria for this job (required applicant type).
jobs.author: Author
jobs.noApplicationsYetBeFirst: No applications yet, be the first!
jobs.applicationsContactDataHint: You see applicants' contact details only because you are the author of this job posting.

jobs.noJobsSidebar: You don't have any jobs yet. Add your first job to find a freelancer.

newJobForm.title: New job
newJobForm.description: Fill in the job details. Billing fields and skills will help match the job to contractors.
newJobForm.skillsDescription: Select from list or type name and press Enter to add (including new skill).
newJobForm.skillsMaxCount: You can add at most 5 skills.
newJobForm.suggestedRateNote: We've suggested a market rate, but you can change it
newJobForm.billingTypeFixedDescription: Fixed rate for the entire project regardless of working time
newJobForm.expectedOffersDescription: Maximum number of offers freelancers can submit.
newJobForm.expectedApplicantTypeDescription: Who can apply to this job (you can select multiple options). Restriction is visible to freelancers.

draftModal.beforeLoginDescription: Your job posting has been saved in browser memory. You need to log in to publish it.
draftModal.afterLoginDescription: You have a saved job in memory. Do you want to return to editing and publish it?

branding.logotypeTagline: Publish and search jobs for freelancers

beta.bar: ðŸ¥³ We're glad you're with us from the start. We're testing the beta. If you spot a bug - let us know.

homepage.heroText: We connect companies with the best contractors
homepage.heroBenefit1Desc: Hand-picked specialists ready to work with you.
homepage.heroBenefit3Desc: Reviews, experience and portfolio in one place.
homepage.welcomeTitle: We connect companies with the best contractors
homepage.heroFeature1: Publish a project in minutes. Describe your needs and reach the right specialists.
homepage.heroFeature2: Choose the best candidates. Compare profiles, experience and reviews.
homepage.heroFeature3: Rate the collaboration. Build credibility and help others make informed decisions.
homepage.heroTextFindingJobs: Find gigs and collaboration that match your skills
homepage.heroFeature1FindingJobs: Create a professional profile. Show your skills, experience and portfolio.
homepage.heroFeature2FindingJobs: Get notified about new projects. Be first where the work is.
homepage.heroFeature3FindingJobs: Find extra or steady gigs. Grow your business and increase income.

notifications.title: Email notifications
notifications.description: Manage your email notifications. Choose which notifications you want to receive and how often.
notifications.newJobsInFollowedCategoriesDesc: Get notified when a new job is posted in categories you follow.
notifications.newJobMatchingSkillsDesc: Get notified when a job matching your skills is posted.
notifications.newApplicationToMyJobDesc: Receive an email when someone applies to a job you published. You can disable this.
notifications.instantDesc: Get notified every time a new matching job is posted.
notifications.instantDescApplications: Get notified every time someone applies to your job.
notifications.dailyDigestDesc: A daily summary email at 6:00 AM with jobs from the previous day.
notifications.dailyDigestDescApplications: A daily summary email at 6:00 AM with applications from the previous day.
